bug.author: CESARDELATORRE
bug.summary: validation_size": 0.3 description should explicitly say that the % value should be provided as a decimal number (between 0 and 1)
bug.description:
The current description of "validation_size" only says: "What percent of the data to hold out for validation when user validation data is not specified." That's misleading. a percent is specified with a number between 0 and 100 (i.e. 20 for a 20% validation set), but the expected number for this argument is a value between 0 and 1, such as 0.2. That should be explicit in the description. Example: validation_size = 0.2 <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
